trans-unit.target: TEXT_HEAVNA319_01620_SEQ_00<tab>Moghan would test your trustworthiness with a trial.

TEXT_HEAVNA319_01620_SEQ_01<tab>You speak with Moghan, one of the three trial-givers named by Moglin, and the moogle alchemist bids you gather a special ingredient for his potions. Search the vicinity of Eil Tohm and collect three sprigs of cloudsbreath.
TEXT_HEAVNA319_01620_SEQ_02<tab>You have plucked three sprigs of the delicate white flower. Return to Moghome, and deliver them to the waiting Moghan.

TEXT_HEAVNA319_01620_SEQ_03<tab>You hand over the sprigs of cloudsbreath to an appreciative Moghan. The alchemist claims that the flower is the main ingredient in a tonic that restores bounce to even the floppiest pom.
TEXT_HEAVNA319_01620_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the sprigs of cloudsbreath to Moghan.
TEXT_HEAVNA319_01620_MOGHAN_000_000<tab>Hello! Yes, I am Moghan─the foremost alchemist in Moghome, if you must know!
TEXT_HEAVNA319_01620_MOGHAN_000_001<tab>If your tummy's gloopy or your wings're droopy, I've a potion to fix that!

TEXT_HEAVNA319_01620_MOGHAN_000_002<tab>Or, I would if I didn't keep running out of ingredients. Luckily, you're here to do my chore─ Er, trial! Yes! Go forth, mighty adventurer, and mightily pluck three sprigs of cloudsbreath for me!
TEXT_HEAVNA319_01620_MOGHAN_000_003<tab>You'll find it blooming near the entrance to Eil Tohm. It's not the safest of places, so don't let yourself be too distracted by the pretty flowers, kupo!
TEXT_HEAVNA319_01620_MOGHAN_000_004<tab>Pick three sprigs of cloudsbreath─that is your trial. Simple enough, kupo?
TEXT_HEAVNA319_01620_MOGHAN_000_005<tab>Just pay attention to the denizens near Eil Tohm. They're not exactly, um, friendly!
TEXT_HEAVNA319_01620_MOGHAN_000_010<tab>Did you have any trouble finding cloudsbreath? I do need it quite urgently, you know...
TEXT_HEAVNA319_01620_MOGHAN_000_011<tab>Oh, yes, these are perfect, kupo! Now I have the main ingredient for my pom tonic.

TEXT_HEAVNA319_01620_MOGHAN_000_012<tab>...Speaking of which, how are <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> feeling, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>? Should you ever feel your pom losing its bounce, then I'm your moogle, kupo!
TEXT_HEAVNA319_01620_SYSTEM_000_900<tab>You have completed the Trials of Trustworthiness. Return to Chieftain Moglin and await his judgment.
